definition: to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: It can also be used in pumping station and diversion works with long pipes.
sentences.chinese: 本装置也可以应用于长输水管道抽水站及引水工程。

sentences.english: The utility model solves the problem that the traditional rocker arm type water conveying pipe can not be bent.
sentences.chinese: 解决了传统的摇臂式输水管不能弯曲的问题。

sentences.english: Lincoln and Bellick go to the water station to cut off the main conduit water.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和巴利克来到了水站，断开了主输水管道的供水。

sentences.english: And the great pipes for carrying water under the streets had burst .
sentences.chinese: 埋在街道下的大输水管道也破裂了。

sentences.english: The concrete water transmission pipes within Huangpo reservoir have been aged with severe seepage.
sentences.chinese: 黄坡水库坝内输水管老化和渗漏严重。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a kind of aqueduct and process of production.
sentences.chinese: 该发明涉及一种输水管及其成型工艺。

sentences.english: The quake destroyed the city’s water mains, paralyzing the fire department.
sentences.chinese: 地震破坏了输水管道，消防署也无能为力。

sentences.english: The reliabilities of some kinds of aqueduct systems are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了几种输水管系统的可靠性。

sentences.english: The utility model belongs to the field of the cast-in-situ engineering of a delivery pipe with large caliber.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型属于大口径输水管现浇工程领域。

definition: pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
